zserio.runtime

Class BitPositionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • zserio.runtime.BitPositionUtil

  • public final class BitPositionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The class provides help methods for manipulation with bit stream position.

    • Method Detail

      • alignTo

        public static long alignTo(int alignmentValue,
                           long bitPosition)
        Aligns the bit size to the given alignment value.
        Parameters:
        alignmentValue - Value to align.
        bitPosition - Current bit position where to apply alignment.
        Returns:
        Aligned bit size.

      • bitsToBytes

        public static long bitsToBytes(long numBits)
        Converts a given bits value into a byte value. If the bits value is not a multiple of 8 an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        numBits - The number of bits to convert.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes.

      • bytesToBits

        public static long bytesToBits(long numBytes)
        Converts a given bytes value into a bits value.
        Parameters:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to convert.
        Returns:
        Number of bits.
